snippet.title: [Ending A] Insmouse no Yakata for Virtual Boy - Complete Playthrough (インスマウスの館)
snippet.description:
It is EXTREMELY hard to get the ending A in this game (aka the True Ending). A few conditions have to be met: you have to complete the game continuously (no using passwords), you can't die even once, and you have to beat almost all of the levels before the panic music starts. This means you have to beat the level with more than half of the allotted time remaining. All of the items spawn randomly. They will be in a different place every time you play the game. The map and exit, however, stay the same. It takes a lot of luck to find the key quickly (especially on the bigger levels). And if you have the exits memorized, all you really need is the key. Of course the orbs will show you the exit, but if you have the map memorized, you don't necessarily need them. It's also good strategy to avoid enemies wherever possible, to avoid dying.

This game was a Japanese exclusive (it was never released outside of Japan). Luckily, most of it is in english anyway. only the box, manual, title screen and end credits have japanese writing.
